title: Omishi Magical Theatre: Risky Safety
alternative_title: Omishi Magical Theater: Risky Safety ; Omishi Mahou Gekijou: Risuki Sefuti
status: Omishi Magical Theater: Risky Safety ; Omishi Mahou Gekijou: Risuki Sefuti
description:
Description :
        From RebelliousArt: Risky is an apprentice shinigami who collects souls. Safety is an apprentice angel who saves souls. Due to some accident, Risky and Safety are now magically stuck into one body.
